Synopsis: Icelandic soccer star Ottar Thor (Bj√∂rn Hlynur Haraldsson) admits in a national magazine that he is gay. His teammates boot him out of the league in an unexpected backlash, so he joins a friend's amateur team. Soon, other gay players flock to the team, and as straight members flee, the team soars in status. The amateurs get a chance to show their mettle when they face the pros in a match on Gay Pride Day.
Title: Eleven Men Out
